text:
A deer was killed by a pack of dogs in Mudaliar Eri village in Kallapadi reserve forest in Gudiyatham range.

Officers of the Forest Department said the male deer aged about four-and-a-half years old was found dead with bite marks on its stomach and legs on Sunday. “Three to four dogs had bit the deer. On information from the land owner, we went to the spot and a post mortem was conducted,” an officer said. - Staff Reporter
title: Deer dies in attack by dogs
